response.answer_text: Costartup is a start-up community designed to connect with like minded people so as to come together and develop a sustainable environment for the existing and the budding entrepreneurs and their startups.The community will be empowered by some monthly activities like Comeetups, workshops, talks to provide ample opportunities to connect with amazing start-ups and the people behind them, to share knowledge with each other, to tap into a strong support network, form meaningful connections and gain inspiration for the start-up journey ahead.In our long term vision, we also plan to develop some awesome Coworking spaces in metro and two-tier cities of the country to support the newborn startups.
